definition: road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: But Ryan Reser of the U.S. judo team has never been to the Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 但是这位美国柔道选手以前从来没有参加过奥运比赛。

sentences.english: Look, he wears a red belt, so he must be a very good judoka.
sentences.chinese: 看，他系的是红带，所以他肯定是柔道高手。

sentences.english: North Korea has relied upon weightlifting, wrestling and judo for its Olympic success.
sentences.chinese: 朝鲜依赖举重，摔跤和柔道在奥运会上取得了成功。

sentences.english: It is said that originally the that daytime legendary figure Tai Yu on the judo history establishes.
sentences.chinese: 据说是日本柔道史上的传奇人物泰裕创建。

sentences.english: Putin is wearing his famous judo outfit. He looks terrific, relaxed.
sentences.chinese: 普京穿着他那套著名的柔道服，看上去棒极了。

sentences.english: I like watching the weight-lifting and I like the judo and boxing.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢看举重，我还喜欢柔道和拳击。

sentences.english: However, the highest one in the thickness of leather pleat is Shihezi women judo team.
sentences.chinese: 可是在皮褶厚度中最高的却是石河子女子柔道队。

sentences.english: I like watching the weight-lifting and I like the judo and boxing.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢看举重表演，还很喜欢柔道和拳击。

sentences.english: Putin, 58, has a black belt in judo.
The Japanese judo is developed from the jiujitsu.
sentences.chinese: 日本的柔道是从柔术发展过来的。

sentences.english: You karate and judo girls dan't stand a chance with an old-fash-Toned wrestler like me.
sentences.chinese: 你们的空手道和柔道赢不了我这老式摔跤手。

sentences.english: But weight lifting and judo players may not get the same attention.
sentences.chinese: 但是举重和柔道运动员或许得不到如此厚爱。

sentences.english: These include sessions of judo, badminton and water polo.
sentences.chinese: 这方面包括柔道，羽毛球和水球。

sentences.english: The sportswoman who got the second place in judo refused to accept the medal.
sentences.chinese: 在柔道比赛中获得第二名的女运动员拒绝领奖。

sentences.english: Like Japan, with gold Ni, judo and also.
sentences.chinese: 象曰，系于金柅，柔道牵也。

sentences.english: I go in for stamp collecting and judo.

definition: Changquan - Northern Shaolin (北少林) - Longfist - Martial Art

military skill or technique (in former times)/all kinds of martial art sports (some claiming spiritual development)/self-defense/tradition of choreographed fights from opera and film (recent usage)/also called kungfu 功夫/CL:種|种[zhong3]
Wing Chun/same as 詠春拳|咏春拳[yong3 chun1 quan2]/Yongchun - "Singing Spring Fist" (Chinese martial art)
Ba Ji Quan "Eight Extremes Fist" - Martial Art
